DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to develop an algorithmic-based evaluation and treatment approach for wearable robotic exoskeleton (WRE) gait training for patients with neurological conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Algorithmic-Based Evaluation and Treatment Approach for Robotic Gait Training
